channel.title: CVE Feed for Easy Registration Forms -- Easy Registration Forms
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Easy Registration Forms -- Easy Registration Forms

item.title: CVE-2021-39353|2024-08-04T02:06:42.435Z -- easy%20registration%20forms -- easy%20registration%20forms
item.description: The Easy Registration Forms WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery due to missing nonce validation via the ajax_add_form function found in the ~/includes/class-form.php file which made it possible for attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in versions up to, and including 2.1.1.
